summary:
EWIs DLO (Dawnguard Landscape Overhaul)
******************
This Texture Set adding new Graphics with higher Resolution and Detail to the vanilla Game
and gives Dawnguards Landscape a beautiful new and unique look.
Not all Textures are created by me. Dawnguard used some Textures from the Maingame.

New Textures fo
descriptionHtml:
[url=http://www.fotos-hochladen.net][img]http://img5.fotos-hochladen.net/uploads/01logolojy6if05n.jpg[/img]
[/url][url=http://www.fotos-hochladen.net][img]http://img5.fotos-hochladen.net/uploads/logoscwr51fnuxpy.jpg[/img][/url]
[size=3][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000]******************[/color]
[color=#00ff00]EWIs DLO (Dawnguard Landscape Overhaul)[/color]

[color=#ff0000]This Texture Set adding new Graphics with higher Resolution and Detail to the vanilla Game[/color]
[color=#ff0000]and gives Dawnguards Landscape a beautiful new and unique look.[/color]
[color=#ff0000]Not all Textures are created by me. Dawnguard used some Textures from the Maingame.[/color]

[color=#ff0000]New Textures for icewalls, icelake, snowcracks, forestdirt and leaves, ground,soulcairn ground, trees, grass and plants.[/color]
[color=#ff0000]Resolutions: 2k and 1k mixed.

Requires Dawnguard DLC.[/color]
[color=#00ffff]******************
******************[/color]
[color=#00ff00]EWIs enhanced Soulcairn[/color]

[color=#ffff00]I wasn't happy about the original Textures. looking horrible and very low res.[/color]
[color=#ffff00]So I decided to make the Textures higher Quality with a nice and dark look.[/color]
[color=#ffff00]Resolution: 1k.[/color]

[color=#ffff00]Requires Dawnguard DLC.[/color]
[color=#ffff00]******************[/color]
[color=#ffff00]install:[/color]
[color=#ffff00]Using your favorite Mod Manager or extract to your Skyrim main folder.[/color]

[color=#ffff00]enjoy.[/color]
[color=#ffff00]ewi65[/color]
[color=#ffff00]******************[/color][/font]
